text: Hi all, I'm not sure if this is the correct channel for this question, but we ran validation on our theme and one of the errors it came back with was no saved sections. On the demo site, we have 17 saved sections. We did copy the theme from our dev portal to our provider portal prior to running the  validation. Could that be it? Don't saved sections follow the theme regardless of how it's distributed? Thanks for any insight you can provide.
